channel.title: Rest Api on Erdal TAŞKESEN
channel.description: Recent content in Rest Api on Erdal TAŞKESEN

item.title: Building a Flask REST API without using 3rd party extension
item.description: In this tutorial, I’m going to show you how to create a simple REST API by using Flask framework. I will not bother you with any sort of advanced topic. Probably you won’t use this tutorial for any kind of production level product. I just want to show how easy can be to create a REST API with Flask. This tutorial aims to build a small and simple app. The entire app fits in a single file.
